alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 10:10AM MST until December 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 8 inches. * WHERE...The Southern Front Range Foothills, and Castle Rock. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick roads resulting in slow and hazardous travel. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow develops late this afternoon and increases in coverage and intensity during the evening commute.
info.instruction: Prepare for rapidly changing road conditions. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet
